case.state: Oh hi-- Eh!?
Hi ~player~, how a-- Eh!??
This Shami- Shadow Mistress has come to play!
I'm Shami-- wait, do we need to introduce ourselves?
Should we wait a little bit longer? I wouldn't want to start before everyone's here.
Hello ~opponent~! Now we just need to wait for the rest. O-Or maybe not?
Wow, is it Demon's Night at the Inventory?
Wait... did pair us up just because we're all demons? Hm... thank you?
Oh God! I'm surrounded by Magical Girls on all sides!
W-Wow, it sure is nice we're playing in the m-middle of a Magical Girl cosplaying convention, huh.
I'm glad we have everyone here. Games are always more fun with more players.
It's nice to see everyone here. Even if it means I'm more likely to lose, ehehe...
Strip Poker... right up a demon's alley.
This is definitely the type of game a demon needs to get stronger!
Let's... just stick with this.
I kinda want a break from thinking about my cards.
Huh, what were we doing? Oh, well just this is fine.
Maybe I should just trust in what I already have.
Ugh, if I touch them I could mess them up...
Come on lucky number ~cards~.
All I need is ~cards~. Or... something like that.
Let's hope this is enough.
I'll take, uh, ~cards~ cards, that's a good number, right?
One! No wait, two? Um, um...
This'll be my hand!
What do I do, what do I do?
So I should take... that one?
Ohhh, so I hand some of them back... and get new ones!
So... if I hand some of my cards back, I can get better ones?
Aww, did you know today was my birthday? I'm so happy!
Wow, did you throw this party because it's my birthday today? ...I think you spelled my name wrong back there, but that's okay! I'm still happy.
Hehehe... what type of cards do I have? You'll just have to wait and see.
W-What do I do? I don't want to waste these!
Woah! there's so many drinks here. I usually just drink the sports drinks Momo gives me after training.
Hm, it feels a little strange to do something without Momo or Mikan. Not that I'm not having fun.
Hehehe, you could say I have the devil's luck.
A queen's kinda like a mistress, right?
(I bet Ogura could figure out what to do with these. She's super smart.)
Just gotta win the next one and I'll go from there.
I'll try not to drop any cards between my chest.
I guess this form does make me better at poker!
You're not taking pity on me, are you?
I like playing in here, I'm all toasty even wearing this.
I'm glad we're playing in here, I'd be a Shami-cicle out there.
This place is so big and open! I bet if I yelled my name it would echo around!
Oh god, what if I knocked something expensive over with my tail by accident. Would the owners want me to pay for it!?
You're supposed to lie in this type of game, right? Isn't that kind of rude?
Hm, should I be taking notes right now? Oh wait! I completely forgot my notebook, ehehe…
I've heard folding is something you do in poker, but why? Wouldn't that just damage the cards?
I may not know what to do with these, but I won't let that stop me!
I should have come with a plan. My head's already spinning.
M-Maybe I should take my time with these...
(What to do, what to do...?)
(Let this be my hand, let this be my hand...!)
I-If I keep saying stuff like `this'll be fine', e-eventually I'll believe it, right?
My head feels way clearer when I wear the Crisis Management form, so I'm sure I can figure out a winning strategy with these.
I never thought I'd find someplace where this outfit actually seemed appropriate.
I-I know I'm wearing... this, but I swear I'm not some sort of exhibitionist.
Is it just me, or is ~player~ kinda... see-through?
I'm definitely going to win this one! Or maybe lose...
What even is a spade?
Is this really someone's bedroom? It must be nice to have all this space to yourself.
That bed looks so big and comfy... I'm getting sleepy just looking at it.
W-Why did I decide to transform into this when it's s-s-sooo c-cold!
N-Now I remember w-why I never transform in the cold!
Ah you know, these are f-fine, I can totally make them work.
I got so distracted looking at the designs on the cards, I didn't even think about which ones to keep...
Feels worse than someone stepping on my tail.
My tail just has no energy now...
You ever bite down on a fresh pancake, only to taste leftover rice and tofu? That's how I'm feeling right now.
Maybe this is more complex than I thought.
Mngh...!
Hey... so, um, hypothetically, if a player were to accidentally drop all her cards, could the game be paused so she-- they, could fix it?
Do I really have to lie? I feel that would leave me with a bad con--, con-- con-science?
Ugh, I tried really hard to remember all the rules, but I keep getting them mixed up in my head...
Your timing is the worst, you know that, dealer?
Wait, are bad cards... actually good in this game? (My head's spinning)
I can't be stressed if I just don't look at my cards.
D-Don't you know, a demon is always stronger when she's backed into a corner!
(Remember, it goes strip, lose, forfeit. Strip, lose, forfeit. Strip, forfeit, lose.) Huh, I feel like I messed something up.
Oh dear father who art sealed within a box...
These boots aren't very comfortable to stand in for a while.
Not feeling very magical right now.
Ugh, now that my head's all clear, I understand how bad these cards are!
Thanks, but ever since these horns and tail popped in, I haven't felt sick at all!
That's so nice! But ever since I got these horns, I haven't been in the hospital once!
I mean, getting more comfortable with nudity and thinking is exactly what any demon girl needs to beat her fri-- nem--, fremesis, right?

I don't know if I mentioned it, but my ancestor actually lives with me! Yep, she's stuck in a small statue, but I carry her around with me and she gives me advice. That... would have been helpful now, actually.
I wish my Ancestor were here. Even though she got sealed in a small statue, she knows all sorts of things. It's too bad I sorta... forgot her at home. Hope she isn't too upset...
Oh... well, this one time I had a dream where I was trapped in a hospital and was being chased by a whole bunch of walking medical equipment!
I... mostly see other people's bad dreams, but there was this one time where I was trapped in a hospital... I didn't like that dream.
Just you and me ~player~. You know, I finally think I'm starting to understand you.
I still can't really get a read on you at all ~player~, but still, I think I'm finally starting to get you a bit.
This outfit's not just for show you know. It makes me stronger! Like being able to climb up two flights of stairs without getting winded, or taking a test without getting distracted.

It may look... strange, but this outfit's pretty useful. All I have to do is yell "crisis management", and I'm capable of doing things I couldn't before, like playing video games for too long without my eyes hurting.
They serve drinks here, right? I wonder if I could get some citrussy, for Mikan's sake!
(For some reason, I'm tempted to ask everyone what their order is.)
Bars are kinda like Cafes, right?
Ow ow ow, how come no one ever told me sand is hot!
Ah! The Crisis Management Form is not designed for sand, my boots are sinking!
Swimming seems like it would be fun, but this isn't really a swim suit.
Woah! who's birthday is it? Is it yours ~player~!?
H-How am I supposed to concentrate with that cake back there...
Woah! The moon is so pretty! Not that I see it looking at you, ~player~, but I'm sure it is!
Every time I'm on a roof, I kinda worry about falling off of it. Does that happen to anyone else?
This hand! It’s uh, that super rare, um, whatchamacallit type of hand!
C'mon, wearing this doesn't embarrass me. W-Well, it does actually, but I just gotta... fake it till I make it!
Cards make more sense now!
...Just do this... and maybe that?
Ugh, these garters kinda pinch. It's distracting!
Hmph, it should be against the rules to bring food here, I-I can't play when I'm distracted like this!
N-No one better try to bribe me to lose on purpose with food, alright? I-It definitely won't work, okay!?
Woah, a monster! I'm always rooting for you guys in the movies!
Isn't it unfair that the undead never win in the movies? They're trying their hardest too!
Woah a ninja... Wait! Shouldn't you be hidden right now!
Woah, a real life ninja! Can you walk on water? Or disappear into a leaf!?
Are you feeling the pressure?, B-Because I sure am...
You know, my name isn't even Shamiko, it's Yuko! But only my mom calls me that anymore. Does anyone else have a nickname like that?
You know, my name is actually Yuko, but it feels weird to be called anything other than Shamiko. Does anyone else have a nickname like that?
I mentioned a... fremesis, right? That's Momo, she's a peach-colored Magical Girl who I've know for a while now. B-But just to be clear, w-we're nemeses over friends, okay?
Er, if I mentioned a... fremesis earlier, that's Momo. She's a peach-colored Magical Girl whose... done a lot for me, so I got to be strong enough to match her. Even if means playing games like this.
Why do they call it "poker" anyway?
I wonder who came up with designs on these cards. I think I'd like to see the process.
I usually like my games more... pixelly. But Strip Poker's actually pretty fun.
(I wonder if ~player~ will let me look at ~player.ifMale(his|her)~ cards?)
(Is this a dream? No, can't be, Momo's not here.)
(I wonder if anyone here has a mind reading power. Hey! Blink twice if you're hearing this.)
I wonder if I'd have better luck at some other type of strip game. I'm only really good at video games though...
Hm, maybe I'm imagining it, but I swear I can feel someone's eyes on me occasionally.
(Is ~player~ looking at me? Or is ~player.ifMale(he|she)~ looking at everyone... some how.)
They serve drinks here, right? I wonder if I could get something citrusy, for Mikan's sake!
Is anyone else hungry? Maybe I should have brought some snacks.
Oh crap, we're not making any bets are we? Because I'm completely out of money.
My school uniform may not look very interesting, but it's super comfy. I wear it a lot, even when I'm not at school!
But... that's a good thing, isn't it? Just cause I'm a demon doesn't mean I should be totally demonic.

condition.saying: Tarak has propaganda showing women as demons. If you're the real thing, they wouldn't be too frightened.

case.state: Hey, I could be plenty frightening if I wanted to! Not that I do, but that's not bad, is it?
I-I don't want to do any of that! I got these horns and tail, isn't that enough!?
R-Really? I thought being a demon was just about having these horns and tail. I really hope it is, because I really don't want to be... all that.
U-Um... no? I'm not really sure I get what you mean. Your words are nice, but your tone's all mean.
I-I've never done anything like that! I don't even get what you mean. You're words are nice but you're saying it all mean.
Of course I'm a demon. I wouldn't have these horns and tail otherwise, right?
Um, yeah, last time I checked. Why else would I have these horns and tail?
They sure are! I didn't believe it at first either. It was really surprising when they popped in!
Mmhm, they popped onto me a while back. I was so surprised, I didn't believe it at first either.
Yes... well, a little bit. I'm not the best at it.
I-I can, but only a little bit. If I push myself, I get all tired.
I-I-I'm not trying to do anything! P-Please don't point that very magical girl looking staff at me!
I-I swear, I'm just your average, everyday demon! P-Please don't use some sort of special attack on me!
Yeah, I am. I didn't glue these horns to my head after all, that would be silly.
'Course I am. Otherwise I have no idea how I'd keep this tail attached.
...Rank? Like in a videogame? I'm not sure. I've heard my father was a great demon, but I think I'm only around level 7. So pretty normal I think.
Huh? ...Rank? Like in an old RPG? I don't really know. I heard my father was a great demon, but I'm just regular old Shamiko.
Me neither, I'm usually with my magical girl... allies. We could be demonic friends if you wanted!
Hm, now that I think about it, I've also only met one or two other demons... hm, well we could be demonic friends if you wanted to.
Oh, um, I like to cook, sometimes I play video games, oh and sometimes I get caught up in all kinds of crazy things around town.
Well sometimes I help with cooking, or I do some training, and I usually get in the middle of some crazy business around town.
W-Well, I still want to be all that, but if I was a better demon, I'd be able to protect those I care for better.
I-I don't want to lose all that, but if I were a better demon I could repay everyone who has protected me in the past.
Wha-- hey! Of course I'm a real demon! I even have a whole bunch of demonic subordinates to prove it!
Of course I'm a real demon! If these horns aren't enough to prove it, the how about my group of subordinates? How's that for demonic!
T-Than-- wait, what was that about demons?
Oh, um, thanks... b-but what did you say you do to demons?

I-I'm sorry, but I need whatever advantage I can get!
C-CRISIS MANAGEMENT FORM!
Don't worry, I won't accidentally stab my tail. That's something you only do once... twice.
Woah... I didn't know there were so many types of weapons. There's a sword... and an axe, and-- oh sorry, I'm meant to strip.
Okay, maybe I should have read the rules better.
Uh, anyone have any tips? I... may not really know how to play poker.
Wha-- hey! I've been... mostly healthy ever since I got these horns, a-and I train everyday! That has to count for something!
I'm not that weak! I-I mean sure I can't use magic very long or I pass out, b-but I train everyday! I-I'll be a strong demon eventually!
But I wanted to see how long I could keep it going...
Just like that!?
I-I'll be back before you know it.
Guess it was too good to last...
It's alright, I just got a new record to beat.
All dreams have to end.
I-I guess the Crisis Management Form can only take me so far.
How's that for crisis managing?
H-How do I make taking off my clothes interesting?
Well, I guess it had to happen sooner or later.
No chance anyone wants to volunteer for me? No? Okay...

Yawn.
Feeling kinda drained. Ah! Sorry, I'll get on with it.
It's weird... I'm so used to weird stuff like curses or going into dreams that just playing a card game feels... weird. I'll... probably get used to it.
I-If you think about it, the goal is really just to lose your clothes, so this is basically winning, I think.
Ooh! What if we thought of strip poker, like a race!
Go! Magic strip! ...Just kidding. For now, anyway.
Yeah, I'm starting to think I should have prepared more before doing this.
I may be losing, but don't feel bad for me, aright!?
A-Anyone have any tips...?
I-I'll get you back for this! (Perfectly demonic comeback line!)
I-I'm not out just yet...
I-I knew I was in over my head!
Argh, alright. But no one better try to step on my tail while I'm doing this, okay!?
A demon gets stronger with every loss. But I'm not really feeling stronger!
You can have fun, while still losing!? This is a whole new world for me!
Mngh, don't get greedy, alright?
I guess... I'm getting used to it, huh?
You-you haven't won just yet!
T-This really is a crisis!
B-But, I thought I was supposed to be smarter with the Crisis Management Form?
Wha-- hey! Am I not demonic enough for you? 'Cause I can be plenty demonic!
Wha-- don't look down on me! I don't mind being called cute, but I could be plenty demonic if I wanted to!
C'mon... just gotta... stretch a little more.
You know, it’s kinda nice to strip normally every once in a while. I feel like I’m only changing my outfit when I yell “crisis management."
You know, this skirt is actually pretty comfortable! I’m a little sad to see it go.
M-My last line of defense…
Y'know, maybe I overreacted a bit. I almost feel I don't ne-- huh?
At times like this, a demon has no choice but to hold her tail up high and accept defeat graciously, still...
I-I'm sorry! B-But I can only leave the Crisis Management Form once I've calmed down, and your yelling is really scary!
I-I would love to, but I only know how to de-transfrom after a crisis is over, and your yelling is making this feel more like a crisis!
Insult you? No-- I mean, I'm sorry, but this is really feeling like a crisis, so I had to transform. I-I really didn't mean to insult you.
I-I sometimes just... transform without thinking about it. It's a real problem, but please don't be mad! I-I didn't mean to insult you!
Y-Yeah, what's wrong with that? Being a demon isn't a bad thing.
W-Why wouldn't I? it's important to be the best demon I can.
I-- yep, this is my crisis management form. I-I'm not the biggest fan of its looks, but transforming is pretty cool.
Really? it always makes me feel like a demonic exhibitionist, but if you like it, maybe I could do some mana training
Huh? How come no one else is naked.
I had a dream like this once, b-but I don't think I can wake up this time.
Oh... I guess I could have just sat down. N-Not that it was difficult for me.
Urk... I've seen way too many crises.
Do you think I could hold onto that? Um, it’s the only uniform skirt I have and I uh, really don’t want to lose it.
Alright Demon, it’s now or never. I gotta bring my A-game i-if I want to keep it together!
I-I transformed? I mean, I transformed!
R-Ran out of mana...
Don't think this means you've won!
Hang in there, ~target~!
It's kinda nice we get so many chances. When I first heard of this game, I though you have to take off everything after losing once!
What will it be this time, something small? Or something big? Or something... medium?
Hm, actually the only guy I really talk to is a talking tapir, so this'll be new to me, I guess...
I've never thought of it before, but it's interesting to see a whole outfit piece by piece.
(Stay interested Shamiko! This could be important.)
Hehehe... another one falls before the shadow mistress...(didn't flub it!)
Yeah I can watch this without losing my composure. Yep, definitely, mm-hm.
D-Does it embarrass you to strip in front of us? Seriously, does it?
Wings!? That's so cool! I don't have wings
W-Wings...? Am I jealous of another demon? I don't know how to process this feeling.
Hm, I don't think I've seen hair that red other than mine... wait! ~target~? Are you also a demon?
Wait... bright red hair... just like me!? ~target~, are you also a demon!?
(I wonder if ~player~ had a special outfit, what would it look like?)
Oh hey, you look like my ancestor! She looks like me, but with a tan.
I think you look like my ancestor! We look pretty similar, but she has a tan, oh and she's blonde too.
Trust me, ~target~, I get how you feel, but it does get a little easier each time you do it.
I-I know you probably don't want us feeling bad for you, ~target~, but I'm sure you could stop if you want to.
I'll commit every part of your technique to memory!
(I hope ~target~ is really okay with this, I wouldn't want her to feel pressured into doing something she doesn't want to.)
Hehe, will you fall to the Sha- Shami-- Damn it!
Maybe it'll be more fun if you shout a cool phrase before you strip!
Don't feel bad, you'll get it next time. (Should I be saying this to someone trying to beat me?)
I just need a few more like this to win! Oh, sorry that you lost though.
(Am... am I excited to see what comes next?) Um, are you ready?
I heard there's a version of this game where you lose money instead. I'm glad we're not doing that...
Heh heh heh, join me in darkness, ~target~.
What happens now? D-Do we play the hand again? Does someone else strip?
Do both of you strip now!?
Hey, what kinda accessories do guys even like?
Guess this isn't a challenge for you, huh?
A small thing here, a small thing there.
Aww, I thought that looked good on you.
Y-You can do it!
I know it doesn't look like much, but it probably has sentimental value to you, right?
( Mngh, how am I jealous of ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~?)
I-Is this really fair...?
Well... I guess I don't hate some down time.
Guess you're one step closer to the goal! Wait, that's not a good thing... is it?
Come on, time for the next round.
Is that how you win?
The right accessory just adds that... pizzaz to your outfit, ya know?

Yawn
...sorry, guess I stayed up too late last night.
Uhhh, what's next?
(What even is an Inventory anyway?)
Accessories can't replace full pieces of clothes, huh...
Maybe I should feel disappointed, but all I feel is hungry.
I get that, ~target~. I get that.
You didn't know, ~target~? I... can't really judge you on it.
Ya know, sometimes the right accessory just makes an outfit come together!
Gah! Did I forget my phone at home this morning?
Stripping... is kinda like cooking, in that I know how to do both. And so do you, stripping anyway, I don't know if you know how to cook.
Your ~clothing~ may be small, but that doesn't mean it isn't as important as the rest.
Are you good with accessorizing, ~target~? I think I have a... friend who could use your help.
It's good your not wearing yourself out... I guess.
Ehehe, I wish I had small stuff like that to take off...
I don't get it, I'd do the same thing if I could, so why is there this tightness in my chest.
~clothing.ifPlural(those|a)~ couldn't keep me warm right now, sadly.
Mngh, I wish I had something like that about now...
Accessories are less fun when you don't have much... actual clothing, ehehe.
I've got plenty of accessories, but my stomach's still cold.
I miss being able to wear hats like that. My horns get in the way now.
Summer is the worst with horns, I can't wear any hats!
I guess you could say the, gloves are coming off... heh.
If you put one of those gloves on my tail, I can show you my "demonic tail-puppet routine". No? Okay...
Could you even hear us before?
Hm, I can only wear those small headphones that go right in your ear. What are they called again?
I used to watch a lot of shows where the characters would transform using special bracelets!
Hey ~target~, that bracelet doesn't let you transform, right? No? Didn't think so...
Ugh, I judge shoes based on how comfortable they look to run in. I've been hanging around Momo too much.
I think shoes should be comfy to wear, walking's hard enough. That's why I wear these!
I think shoes should be comfy to wear, walking's hard enough. That's why I wear these!
... How many was that again?
I wonder if you can recycle old clothes to make accessories. I do something like that with food.
Hm, do you think there are any accessories which would look good on my horns, ~target~?
I'm glad you know how to accessorize, ~target~. Unlike some people I know.
Hm, how many chances do we get anyway?
Make sure to put that somewhere you'll remember. I like to use my tail, for example.
Uh, ~target~, would you be interested in talking some more after the game. A shadow mistress needs subordinates after all.
(Why can't I have something like that right now!?)
I see! Keep taking off small stuff to keep us on our toes, genius.
Now that I think about it, the Crisis Management Form has so many small pieces, it'd be a pain to put it on without magic.
(Hm, I think I get my next paycheck from the cafe soon, but how should I spend it?)
You--you better not try to hang that on my horns, alright?
(As long as I keep watching, I'll eventually pick up ~target~'s--) Hey what's that?
Guess it had to go at some point, huh?
Say goodbye to your ~clothing~.
(Gotta be patient, gotta be patient, gotta be patient.)
I'm... minorly disappointed.
If I were in ~name~'s place, what would I do?
Ooh! Was that part of some special... stripping outfit? Or just normal clothes.
Phew Guess I'm safe for a little while longer.
Hm? What were we doing again? Oh right, the stripping part!
If you want, you can leave that with me. I'll make sure it doesn't get dirty.
Huh? What were we on again?
Now's a good a time as any.
Make sure to properly fold it, you wouldn't want it to get wrinkled!
Oh it's over.
A bit looser now, right?
I-It's definitely breezier now, right?
Is this part of some... cool strategy I don't get?
Hm, would I look good in something like that?
I can wait however long you need.
I uh... what was I gonna say?
Ya know, taking care of your clothes is important! I remember this one time where I messed up my laundry, I ended up shrinking my only uniform!
Don't rush. It wouldn't be good if you tripped.
Would I have gone for that?
Did I forget anything when I left this morning?
ehehe... going slow I see. Wish I did the same
Keep your eyes on those. I always lose my socks at the worst time.
Ever notice how you always seem to lose just one sock?
There's something nice about seeing those long socks come off bit by bit.
Could you... could you take those off slowly? I think that would be... nice
I don't have a lot of chances to buy new clothes, so is something like that in style right now, ~name~?
Just keep on keeping on, ~target~.
Could I wear that? Yes... no. Yes...?
... What was I saying again?
Ya know, I've been wearing the same outfits for years. Maybe it's time I spring for more variety.
clothes are like food. It's best to try a whole bunch of different styles.
(Guess it doesn't matter.)
I got distracted, and can't remember what I was thinking about!
Eh? You're stopping here?
Oh God, I was wrong!
(Oof, can my legs really hurt just from standing, I guess I really do need to do those stretches Momo recommended me.)
I feel kinda bad you're taking off so much, but... a win's a win.
Gah! An armor break!
Ooh! I knew it'd be your ~clothing~, go me!
You're really okay... exposing your weak points?
Try not to throw it on my tail when you're done!
How many different styles of underwear are there?
W-What's next...?
Maybe I should look up some pictures of... half-naked guys when I get back, j-just to compare.
J-Just a little more...?
Oh! Did something interesting happen while I was distracted?
Alright... I guess that's enough.
Woah, you just threw that aside, huh?
If you're embarrassed, just imagine everyone naked. Oh wait, that probably won't help here, would it?
It's best to start small and go bigger. Gah! I should have brought my notepad.
Are you getting fired up?
Hm, it's kinda hard to say whether you looked better with or without that.
Did... did ~target~ always look so... interesting?
Hm, wonder what's next. Could I guess it?
(I can kinda see it already.)
Wait! I just realized I added clothes by transforming. Does that count as cheating!?
S-So bright! W-What's happening!?
So loud! So bright!
Taking off clothes normally is fine and all, but wouldn't it be nicer if you had a flashy transformation sequence instead?
You're going to take off your ~clothing~, right? Right!?
If you're losing ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~, then you'll have to be clever to win. I know what that's like.
O-Oh of course, your ~clothing~. W-What else would it have been?
Hehehe, are you getting shy now? You totally are.
I... guess it's okay to do this for the game.
Doesn't this... embarrass you?
It sorta feels like we're in the same place now, right, ~target~?
Hm, fewer flashes and bangs when you get this low, huh.
Oooh, you're definitely looking better now!
You must be a total pro at this, right, ~target~?
I-I, I uh... (tongue won't move...!)
Woah...! Now that I can see again, you really do look cool!
Woah, that golden hair is so... so... so cool! But is there supposed to be a fuzzy black spot on it?
Isn't this... extra embarrassing for you, ~player~? I mean with you standing in front of us. Or maybe you like that?
Hey! You don't have to stand all the way in front us like that, ~player~. You can come here if you want. Or not, that's fine.
Well, I guess this is fine too.
L-Lookin' good!
I was wondering what was under ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~.
I-I'm looking closely... but respectfully, I-I swear!
If you need help folding those, I'd be happy to help. That doesn't mean you can hang your ~clothing~ on my horns though!
Make sure not to lose that... It's gotta be important to you.
Wow, ~target~ you're so pretty. I-I'm almost a little jealous.
What's next?
You're not out yet, ~target~.
There's a very important difference between naked and half-naked.
( She didn't even have to transform to show that much skin?)
I-I'm still winning the battle outfit competition. N-Not that that was ever happening, but if there was!
I've never seen something like this before. It's a bit exciting!
S-Shirtless is fine...
We... have to do this, huh.
Hm, it feels weird to look... but that's kinda the point of the game, isn't it?
This game feels like an emotional test, and one I forgot to study for.
I think I had a dream like this once, but they're always so hard to remember once you wake up.
This is it, right? Shirt's off?
A guy's chest isn't something I see everyday. Then again, I don't see a girl's everyday either.
C-Could I get a closer look?
I thought I recognized how your clothes hang a little. Mine also used to do that...
That's about what I expected, I think.
Do you do this all the time?
Ah, you're definitely the center of attention now...
I'll just keep on looking.
Hm... no reaction.
Hm... thought I'd feel more seeing this. Wait! A little...?

(This is new...)
I'll just think of these feelings as a form of mental training, that makes sense.
Think I'm learning some new stuff about myself today.
It gets cold without a shirt on, right? I can relate.
You can already see mine...
(Big reveal...)
I saw the shape through your underwear, so I'll definitely be ready for this.
It's good that this is a game, otherwise you'd be arrested for public indecency.

D-Don't do it quickly! For my sake!
How do you handle all that attention...
I dunno what to think about this...
(It's just a fleshy tube Shamiko, don't panic!)
It's coming! Well not yet, but it's here!
Aww, it's kinda cute! I think...
What was I worried about again?
Don't they get bigger or smaller at times?
I thought it'd be intimidating, but it's really not!
Uh... huh.
Huh? Oh! There it is.

I guess... I don't really know my preferences.

Yeah, I don't really get how those things work, like, internally.

Yep... n-nothing wrong with that one.
Can it... get bigger?

I-Im not staring! I mean it!! Really, I'm not!!!

It just goes on and on...
What do you even do with that much!
How much bigger can it get!?
I-i-it's supposed to look like that?

I may not know much, b-but that's too much!
(Maybe if I tilt my head to the side a bit... hm.)
I wasn't prepared!
Very impressive... y-you must have worked hard for it
It just comes out like that!?
Gah! My brain just turned off for a second!

Watch it! You're gonna set my tail on fire!
Do you have some cool stripping trick planned?
Oh hey! Maybe I could help with that!

You ready, ~target~?
Hehehe... scared to take it all off? I know I would be.
Boobs are nice, but tummy is even better.
Is this anticipation I'm feeling?
(Don't be too forward, Shamiko, that's how you get judo flipped.)
You should do it slowly... I think that would be nice.
Wow, ~target~, you're so... aerodynamic!
Small! Definitely not a problem!
I bet you can do sit-ups no problem!
I'm finally winning at something!
Compared to yours, mine are pretty large, huh.
I bet you have no trouble with a run!
I'm, uh, a little unsure what to say here. They're cute? Was that rude?

Oh wow...
Small bests are the breast. Wait...

Y'know, people think boobs are all about size, but there are a whole lot of other things which make them nice too!
That's the hard part over...

I, uh... yep, yep, I'm fine.

Ah... ah. nice... boobs?

W-Woah...

L-Let em free.
An even match!
(Boing, boing.)

When you move it's like a seesaw...
All I've got are two think pieces of fabric to keep me from looking the same as you...
Hey! We're matching! Well, not really, but it feels like it.
For some reason... it feels more natural to see something like this at a Hot Spring.
My Ancestor Lilith loves Hot Springs. If I remembered to bring her, I'm sure she'd want to take a dip.
Now that you're... like that, are you planning on taking a dip?
Hm, I guess I'm a little curious.
I've never gotten this far!
Careful observation is the best way to know my enemy, but I guess it's a bit late for that.
What'll it look like? What'll it look like!?

~target~'s making a cute face...
Are you showing it off?
Go on! Ah, only if you're comfortable.
I'm getting all tingly!

T-T-Too fast! Too fast!
It's cuter than I expected!
Maybe this game is worth playing again...
I hope I get this chance again...
So, um, do you do this often?
Y-Yeah, I've seen stuff like this before. All t-the time, really.
(Does mine look like that?)
Huh... I guess I've never seen one so close up.

Hey, it's like mine! But they all look pretty similar, don't they?
Woah, so you're like some kind of demon master! Hey could I ask you some questions then?
Oooh, so you really are a top-tier demon then. Hey, since I'm pretty new to this whole demon thing, could I ask you some questions?

Woah...! Your armor looks super cool! They look right out of a video game! Where'd you get them?

That apron... I'm just curious, but do you work in a hospital?
Wow, your armor's so cool! And those horns! Y-You must be some kind of powerful demon, right? Right?
Wow... I've never met another demon with wings and horns like that! You must be super powerful, right?
Something about you... seems so mature, ~target~. Ergh, it's a little intimidating.
You've got this air of maturity around you, ~target~. I'm... a little intimidated.
Hm, maybe it's all the old video games I've played, but ~target~, I have to ask, are you any good with magic?
Hm, I'm getting a real pixelly feeling from you, ~target~. Gasp! Does that mean you're good with magic!?
(Hm, ~target~ is serious, doesn't say much, and her hair is... almost the right color.) Hey... ~target~? What's your opinion on muscle training.
Hm, ~target~, I'm getting a certain... peach-scented feeling from you. I have to ask, if you could choose between a good book, or a chance to exercise, what would you do?
Aw ~target~, you're so cute! You probably don't have much experience with this either right? I can relate!
Oh ~target~, someone cute like you probably doesn't have much experience with something this, right? Me neither!
T-That outfit of yours, ~target~... y-you're not one of "them", are you?
T-That outfit, so bright... so frilly...! ~target~, you're not one "them", are you!?

I sorta get this familiar... dependable feeling from you ~target~. Do you have any feelings on muscle training?

Oh ~target~, I was wondering, do you have any poker tips? It's just... you seem pretty experienced and I'm a complete newbie.

W-Wow ~target~, your cosplay is... s-so good! Very accurate!

(Oh God a magical girl) A-Any chance you're just cosplaying, ~target~...
(Pink hair, wonder what it smells like...)
I bet your hair tastes like peaches too, right ~target~?

Messy hair can be the worst. Sometimes when I'm not paying attention, my tail gets caught in mine!
I get you ~target~, if I don't get a trim every once in a while, my hair looks like a neglected sheep as well.
Hey, ~target~, do those horns ever get in the way of sleeping for you? I remember when these first popped in, I could never sleep on my side.
Ooh, ~target~ if you ever need any recommendation for a pillow, I know a really good ring-shaped one. Made sleeping with these horns no problem.
Woah! A fellow demon! I never expected to see someone like that here!

You've never been able to reach the top shelf too, right ~name~? Sniff, I'm so happy I found someone who can relate!
I wish I had wings sometimes. I feel like wouldn't have to worry about running late, or getting lost, or running late because I got lost, if I had wings.

Woah, ~target~, what kind of horns are those!?

Definitely feeling something...

Uh... no. Not in the flesh anyway. Is that a bad thing?

You can do it ~target~! I believe in you!

Hey! My hair used to be brown like that too! What a nice reminder.
Hey, both of us have red hair, ~target~! Together, we're like, double red!
